If you are a diving enthusiast , you ' ll definitely love spending time in Playa la Audiencia since its waters are shallow , calm and filled with rocks covered with corals . Playa Brujas , Mazatlan Playa Brujas is probably one of the best surfing spots in Mazatlan . Playa Brujas is located 20 minutes ' drive from the heart of Mazatlan and it ' s a popular spot among local surfers . If you are a surfer looking to hit some waves along the west coast of Mexico , you ' 1l find Playa Brujas a very good spot to visit since Brujas possesses satisfactory waves all year round .
